articles.author: HT Correspondent
articles.title: South Asia hostage to Kashmir issue, India mistook peace overtures for weakness: Imran Khan - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Ties between India and Pakistan are currently at an all-time low following a string of high-profile terror attacks in recent years that were all blamed on Pakistan-based terror groups. India has said that terrorism and talks cannot go together. | World News
articles.content:
The whole of South Asia is hostage to the issue of Kashmir and Islamabads overtures for peace were mistaken by New Delhi as a sign of weakness, Pakistan Prime Minister Imran Khan said on Thursday.

articles.title: PSEI joins most Asian markets higher in rise - ANC 24/7
articles.description: The Philippine Stock Exchange Index joined most Asian markets higher as it returned to trade following Wednesday's holiday.

articles.title: Cynthia Koh lands on Greek TV news for 'milk-your-curves' dress - AsiaOne
articles.description: Local actress Cynthia Koh has appeared on Greek TV news for her controversial 'milk-your-curves’ dress that she recently wore to the Asian Academy Creative Awards. Yesterday (Dec 8), the 47-year-old expressed her joy and shock on a series of Instagram Stories…

articles.title: Singapore boasts 6 spots on World's 50 Best Bars 2021 list - CNA
articles.description: London's Connaught Bar is the world's best, while Jigger & Pony is Singapore's only entry in the Top 10 at No 9. Atlas lost its The Best Bar in Asia title, which it had held for two years.
articles.content:
Nightlife in Singapore may have quieted down during the pandemic but that hasnt stopped some of our local drinking establishments from topping the Worlds 50 Best Bars 2021 list.
